title: Topic 001 Question 102
body: Your organization needs to grant users access to query datasets in BigQuery but prevent them from accidentally deleting the datasets. You want a solution that follows Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
options: Add users to roles/bigquery user role only, instead of roles/bigquery dataOwner.
Add users to roles/bigquery dataEditor role only, instead of roles/bigquery dataOwner.
Create a custom role by removing delete permissions, and add users to that role only.
Create a custom role by removing delete permissions. Add users to the group, and then add the group to the custom role.
